devsim.zip

This is the DEVSIM distribution in a zip format.  Extract the files from
the archive into your preferred directory, e.g. c:\.  Product
documentation is available in the devsim\doc directory.  You may need to
install the Visual C++ 2008 SP1 Redistributable package below. 

vcredist_x86.exe

This is the Visual C++ 2008 SP1 Redistributable package.  It contains
system libraries required for running programs compiled in Visual C++.
It is provided for your convenience.  This package may already installed
be installed on your system.
